5. djWasabi.request¶

Basic functions for doing http requests via the requests module.

djWasabi.request.verifyResponse(success: Optional[bool] = None, data: Optional[dict] = None, debug: bool = False) → dict[source]¶

Get the correct configuration for the repository.

Parameters

  • success (bool) – The default configuration we will override.

  • data (dict) – The compleet requests data object.

  • debug (bool) – If we need to debug or not.

Return type

dict

Returns

The combination of the default and overriden config.
